Components.Formatter

Class CAST2TextComp

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • Components.CPAMOJAComponent
            • Components.Formatter.CAST2TextComp
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAST2TextComp, IPAMOJAComponent, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener

    public class CAST2TextComp
extends CPAMOJAComponent
implements IAST2TextComp, java.beans.PropertyChangeListener
    A composite component with a mapping from AST to formatted text.

    A AST2Text component consists of an assembly of AST2BoxTree, BoxTree2Stream and Stream2Text subcomponents. It observes both a language and a presentation component, and maintains consistency between its language specifications and that of the former, and between its presentation style and that of the later.

    See Also:
    CAST2BoxTreeComp, CBoxTree2StreamComp, CSymbolstream2TextComp, Serialized Form

      • propertyChange

        public void propertyChange(java.beans.PropertyChangeEvent evt)
        Handle property change events from Language and Presentation Components. If the property change is from:
        • Language - retrieve the Language object and passes its value to Stream2Text subcomponent
        • Presentation - retrieve the Presentation object and passes its value to AST2BoxTree subcomponent
        Specified by:
        propertyChange in interface java.beans.PropertyChangeListener
        Parameters:
        evt - event object with the new value
